name: Jaime SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Santiago v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Jaime SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of June, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
69 A.3d 239
Jaime SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 77 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 27, 2013.
